channel.title: Aeronity
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ufu17a.png[/img] [i] [size=18pt]Idea:[/size][/i] Aeronity will be a [b]Hyperion[/b] based server that revolves around combat. Its a 317 loading the 377 cache, I do not plan to load things that weren't originally in the cache like Dragon fire shield, Bandos godsword, Dark bow, Vesta long sword, etc. I [b]AM[/b] going to release this. Not because I like people leaching my work, but because I believe it would encourage people to use a much better base then Winter Love. It would also encourage people to learn two other languages, [b]XML[/b] and [b]Python[/b]. [i] [size=18pt]Team:[/size][/i] [b]Ryan[/b] (Aeronity) [i] [size=18pt]Goal:[/size][/i] To make a fun, stable, 'old-school' server that players won't get bored on.* * It will not be like a old school remake, but its not going to be some customscapedmodsneededdclawspecpickupitem0wnag3scape [i] [size=18pt]Languages:[/size][/i] [b]Python[/b]; almost all content will be written in Python. [b]XML[/b]; our database language. And [b]Java[/b], of course. [i] [size=18pt]Media:[/size][/i] [b]Server[/b]
[IMG]http://i524.photobucket.com/albums/cc330/Rabrg/boating.gif[/img]
[b]Client[/b]
[i] [size=18pt]Update log:[/size][/i]
10/18: Started project. Changed the JScript loading to Python. Started loading all packets from Python. Started boating system. Fixed 1 pixel length of the game screen not displaying. 10/19: Added basic things like shops, running, and options saving. Started achievement system. (In a way its like RuneScapes) Added NPC spawning. TODO: load spawns from a XML database. Added scripting support to NPC options. Finished loading spawns from a XML database. Added some action buttons + action button script support. 10/21: Sorry for the lack of updates, life has been busy lately. Added teleporting. 10/22: Dialogue loading from a XML data base, NPC, Player and Options. 10/23: Dropping and picking up added. Eating added. 10/26: Started on thieving. 11/5: Started on herblore. Fixed running. Started on combat. 11/8: Started music. Started sound effects. Started a membership system.
[/center] Sorry about the lack of information, I made this in a hurry. I will update this later.

item.title: Aeronity
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

It was done through a loop. Stop posting here, so far you’ve just been posting your opinion and complete bull shit.

I have an idea; About you stop bitching about how you think I’m bull shitting and you download Hyperion, make a command that spawns NPC’s across the world, and test it for yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Aeronity
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Aeronity:

Would you like a screen shot? Well, that wouldn’t really show much since it spawns them accross the world, not just in a region. And if I made it print out that it has that many NPC’s on you would say I photo shopped it or something. Also, you can stop posting here lol. Ill admit it was lagging pretty bad lul, I don’t know how much it can hold without lagging since I was spawning NPC’s by 50k.

I still think your bullshitting, 50,000 is still a big number and spawning 50,000 at once is a lot…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Aeronity, post:23, topic:364973”]How is it going the wrong way?

Tested how many NPC’s it can hold, started lagging at about 300k. This is on my shitty house computer.[/quote]

I think your ling, 300,000 is a big number you know. I doubt any server made so far could have 300,000 NPC loaded.

item.title: Aeronity
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Good luck with your project, but your boat is going the wrong way.

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:16, topic:364973”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=461174.msg3375204#msg3375204 date=1287540028]

[quote]It will not be like a old school remake, but its not going to be some customscapedmodsneededdclawspecpickupitem0wnag3scape

Best…line…ever. And good luck with this, Hyperion is a good base.
[/quote]

LMAO Good source bud
[/quote]

No Hyperion is a base, a source is something that is already coded.[/quote]

What is this logic?

Hyperion is already coded, it was released with some content so your saying it is a base, but after that it’s also a source since it’s already coded?..

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

I have not quit this project, and I’m not going to. Sorry for the lack of updates, I have a lot of things going on. Ive started on some more basic content like combat. (Thanks Emperor for the base).

I would still like a partner for this project, I haven’t talked to Adam for awhile.
